meanings.sent1: The prettied flowers brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: She wore a prettied dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The prettied cupcakes made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The prettied garden looked like a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The prettied painting was a masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: She prettied up the room with colorful decorations.
meanings.sent2: He prettied the gift with a bow.
meanings.sent3: The chef prettied the dessert with a sprinkle of glitter.
meanings.sent4: She prettied the plain dress with lace.
meanings.sent5: He prettied the garden with fairy lights.

meanings.sent1: The garden prettied up as the flowers bloomed.
meanings.sent2: The room prettied up with the new curtains.
meanings.sent3: The cake prettied up nicely in the oven.
meanings.sent4: The sky prettied up with the sunset colors.
meanings.sent5: Her face prettied up when she smiled.
